name: bloln
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c2 ∈ c4)

stmt.origin: isblo(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, co(c0, cnmoo, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cnv)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(cfv(co(c0, cnmoo, c1), c2), clt, cpnf))))

⊣ (c0[normOpOLD]c1)=(c0[normOpOLD]c1)
⊣ c4 =(c0[LnOp]c1)
⊣ c3 =(c0[BLnOp]c1)
